channel.title: SpeechRecognition on NeuroSnippets
channel.description: Recent content in SpeechRecognition on NeuroSnippets

item.title: Hey Jarvis, what's up? A voice assistant to monitor a target application
item.description: Can’t you just tell me? Let’s be frank: we are always running a lot of stuff, we constantly juggle multiple flows of data processing, on top of hundreds of tabs in the browser, email clients, drafts, honestly my head starts spinning just if I keep following this train of thought. I always feel that this kind of ordinary and apparent multi-tasking approach always takes its toll on focus. When it comes to deep focus, I personally believe that there is no solution: one has to avoid any context switching.
